alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:56PM CDT until July 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HANCOCK...HENDERSON...WARREN...MCDONOUGH...MERCER... CENTRAL DES MOINES AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Alexis to Adrian, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Macomb, Fort Madison, Monmouth, Aledo, Carthage, Oquawka, Nauvoo, Bushnell, West Burlington, Burgess, Colchester, La Harpe, Roseville, Viola, Dallas City, Stronghurst, Millersburg, Matherville and Kirkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
